name: Weizhe Fan
story: Weizhe Fan joined the military as a way to give back to his country and make a difference. As a master of reconnaissance and medical aid, he is well trained to handle any situation. Weizhe's primary goal in his service is to save as many lives as possible, regardless of which faction they belong to. Despite his quiet and determined nature, he maintains a positive attitude and hopes to continue to improve his skills and make meaningful contributions to the cause.
